issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] to_timestamp function parses timestamp without timezone offset as UTC rather than local
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9961](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9961). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-9944 added a TO_TIMESTAMP function that supports parsing timestamps without a specified timezone, such as `2020-09-08T13:42:29.190855`

Such timestamps are supposed to be interpreted as in the local timezone, but instead are interpreted as UTC.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9961?focusedCommentId=17194772) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8161
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8161>
